title: I try to launch League but cannot
body: When I press the League Client icon, I only get the response that it is not a valid win32 application. When I go through the launcher.exe it opens the launcher but will not launch the actual game. I have tried repairing and reinstalling already. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Your OS may not have all the right settings in place to allow League to run. Without certain permissions set up, Windows can think that League isn't safe and just blocks it entirely. Check out our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for steps to get that set up. Hit me back if that doesn't seem to help!
